answer:
Take a copy of your immunization record to any pharmacy where vaccines are given to purchase and complete your Twinrix (Hepatitis A/B) series. Learn more about travel vaccines here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Take a copy of your immunization record to any pharmacy where vaccines are given to purchase and complete your Twinrix (Hepatitis A/B) series.

Learn more about travel vaccines here.
Immunization Nurse
question: Do I have to get my all of the Twinrix vaccination shots at the same pharmacy?
question_variation_0: are twinrix vaccination shots a vaccine
question_variation_1: do i need to buy twinrix vaccine shots at a pharmacy?
